caseTitle: D. G. Khan Cement Company Ltd. v. Government of Punjab through its Chief Secretary, Lahore, etc
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Scope of “Negative Area” under the Punjab Industries (Control on Establishment and Enlargement) Ordinance, 1963. Precautionary Principle in Dubio Pro Natura. Climate change, climate justice, water justice, inter-generational justice and climate democracy.
